name: Sensing the Food
content: The 5th Symposium of Greek Gastronomy will take a fresh look at the intersection of food and the senses. It will approach the many topics related to them by means of oral presentations, workshops, performances, story-telling, singing, cooking etc. It will take place outdoors close to nature. Forget about microphones and PowerPoint and be creative!! Reimagine the concept of your presentation and push its boundaries to create immersive moments.
